snippet.title: Hiddenverse: Divided Kingdom
snippet.description:
Help Tom, a young engineer, find out who poisoned his friend and savior of the kingdom, Lady Sarah. The kingdom is divided as the Royal Council, mining factory owners and the wizard of the ancient forest are quarreling over the source of ancient magic! Only you can solve the mystery behind the conflict that is slowly ripping the kingdom apart. Can you save the kingdom in time? Find out in this exciting hidden object, match 3 adventure game!

• An exciting story in a steampunk setting.
• 100+ game levels.
• More than 20 different game mechanics.
• 500 unique game tools.
